ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Someone take me under their wing!
ygData.msgSnippet: I have 2 EverQuest accounts, I should have received a key for both of them but for the life of m I cant find the emails.  My guess is that my spam filter ate
ygData.messageBody:
I have 2 EverQuest accounts, I should have received a key for both of them but for the life of m I cant find the emails.  My guess is that my spam filter ate them before I ever knew I had them.  Oh well! :(  So I'd like to know if this is possible as well.  I'm not sweating it though cause I dont really have any friends whom I would give the keys to, they'd just go to waste.  However, I do have the EverQuest Evolutions pack unopened.  I was goign to set up a 3rd account once I got another computer powerful enough to run it.  But I may end up selling it to someone or giving it away as a gift if I come across anyone who might want to start playing.
 
 
Wulfric
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Melanie Johnson
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, June 21, 2004 12:34 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Someone take me under their wing!

I was wondering if anyone knows if there is a way to
request one of these keys? I have an EQ acount
already, but I believe it must have been inactive when
they first sent the buddy keys out. I recently
re-subscribed at the first of June, so I'm not sure
when these keys came out. I was kind of hoping to get
one for my sister. :)

Thanks

--- Thomas Houseman <thomashouseman@...>
